long_description: The Big Agnes Three Forks shelter can be utilized as a freestanding sunshade and group shelter. Three Forks shelter features 2 large entry points and 2 open-sided walls. A single wall panel is included: it may be attached to either side wall to block prevailing wind or sun, or it may be removed to create 4 open sides. Webbing frame connection creates additional structural stability. Reflective guylines and webbing at corners enhances nighttime visibility. Durable ripstop polyester fly; pole sleeves are simple to use. Lightweight aluminum pole system with press fit connectors; securely fixed, pressed-in ferrules ensure the poles will remain strong and reliable. All seams are taped with waterproof, solvent-free polyurethane tape (no PVC or VOCs). Big Agnes Three Forks shelter includes stuff sacks, 8 aluminum hook stakes and 4 sandbag stakes (sand not included). Additional wall panel sold separately.
short_description: The Big Agnes Three Forks shelter can be utilized as a freestanding sunshade and group shelter. Three Forks shelter features 2 large entry points and 2 open-sided walls.
